name: Aesthetic Pasta
description:
Controls: WASD or Arrow Keys

Try to eat your Pasta and listen to some aesthetic music.
Please reload page after getting one of the endings if you want to see the other one.

Gamedesign & Music by hrschkfr

Made with Bitsy by Adam Le Doux

also used Borksy by Andrew Yolland , Bitsymuse by David Mowatt Music made with Ableton 10
